name: HITOTSU NO MORI
detailed_description:
A JRPG with exquisite watercolor-paiting-style-artwork.

Long ago, "Ghosts" roamed the world.
They were huge and savage. Wreaked havoc of the human world.
Then the Guardian Beasts came into being. Humans fought along side them for generations.
And finally, they sealed the "Ghosts".
To recover and to keep them under surveillance, the Guardian Beasts hided themselves in the forests.
Evil gathered, and their watch began.

About this game:
■Players can "mix" items to create powerful ones.
■There are 3 kind of "Ghosts", "Nen-oni", "Beast-oni" and "Wraith".
■During battle, you can gather great strength by "Guarding".
■Gaining "Purging Points" by taking down enemies. You can upgrade yourself using them but since the enemies won't respawn, it's better to use them wisely.
